title: Flow Measure
description: Profile — Measure identification block. Defines the measure being reported including its name, unit of measure, and API endpoints for data retrieval.

$comment.const: Measure definition — identifies the measure being reported

$namespace.description: Profile namespace URI for this building block

uom.description: Unit of measure (e.g. kWh, MW, degC)

intervalType.description: The interval type (e.g. Hourly, Daily, Monthly, Tag, Timestamp)

parent.description: Parent node name in the data model hierarchy

format.description: Display format string for the measure value

measureDataApiEndpoint.description: API endpoint URL to retrieve measure data (without attributes)

measureDataApiEndpointWithAttributes.description: API endpoint URL to retrieve measure data (with attributes)
